title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Interactive Case Study Design for Medical Professional Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflict situations in interprofessional collaboration scenarios with over 90% accuracy and apply empathetic approaches
Learners can experience roles of at least three medical professionals through mobile platform-based interactive case studies and explain decision-making processes
Learners can present five effective communication strategies for multidisciplinary teams with over 85% performance in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
